ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.summary: Modular Earth System Model Emulator with spatially Resolved output

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "mesmer" %}
{% set pypiname = "mesmer-emulator" %}
{% set version = "0.10.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ pypiname[0] }}/{{ pypiname }}/{{ pypiname }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: c8ff1b5b4bff0a59cd93cd6b4dc694ec20c440a39b32851182c6e915fb9aa2f7

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed -vvv

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - setuptools >=42
    - setuptools-scm >=7
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - dask
    - distributed
    - joblib
    - numpy
    - packaging
    - pandas >=2
    - pooch
    - pyproj
    - regionmask >=0.8
    - scikit-learn
    - scipy
    - statsmodels
    - xarray >=2023.04

test:
  imports:
    - mesmer
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
  commands:
    - pip check
    - python -c "import mesmer; assert mesmer.__version__ == '{{ version }}', mesmer.__version__"

about:
  home: https://github.com/MESMER-group/mesmer
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Modular Earth System Model Emulator with spatially Resolved output
  doc_url: https://mesmer-emulator.readthedocs.io/en/stable/
  dev_url: https://github.com/MESMER-group/mesmer

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - znicholls
    - mathause
